sentences.english: Yan not only, still tube tube sun grain and medicine.

sentences.chinese: 据说炎帝神农发现茶叶可以用来解毒。

sentences.chinese: 作者以现代人的思维去感受炎帝形象传达的现实。

sentences.english: Which clan did Yan Emperor fight against? Who was the leader of that clan?
sentences.chinese: 炎帝与谁为首领的什么族发生战争？

sentences.english: Emperor Yan and Emperor Shun are all buried in Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 中华民族的始祖炎帝以及舜帝，也安寝在湖南。

sentences.english: According to legend, his mother, Yan response "dragon head" was born.

sentences.english: The Yen Di buried at the end of Chaxiang County of Changaha is the first generation.

sentences.english: The Yen Di buried at the end of Chaxiang County of Changaha is the first generation.
sentences.chinese: 葬在“长沙茶乡之尾”炎帝陵的是第一代炎帝。

sentences.english: Who got win after the alliance break between Huang and Yan Emperor?
sentences.chinese: 黄帝和炎帝的联合破裂后，谁取得了胜利？

sentences.english: This is in fact the embodiment of Yandi daughter, named baby girl.
sentences.chinese: 这其实是炎帝小女儿的化身，名叫女娃。

sentences.english: With whose help did Yan Emperor beat the Jiuli nationality?

sentences.english: Health and Yan Emperor, personal ox, longer than the ginger water, because to me Yan.

sentences.english: They knew Huang emperor and Yan emperor.

sentences.english: Don't you forget that Shennong, the Yan Emperor, was the chief of the ancient Qiang tribesmen.
sentences.chinese: 你忘了，这炎帝神农氏是古时候羌族的首领。

sentences.english: According to the historical document, Baoji is the birthplace of Yandi tribe.
sentences.chinese: 根据文献记载，宝鸡是炎帝部落的发祥地。

sentences.english: Zhuzhou has had a special position in formation and development process of Yan Emperor culture.
sentences.chinese: 株洲在炎帝文化的形成与发展过程有特殊的地位。

definition: the Yellow Emperor, mythological emperor of China, reigned c. 2697-2597 BC
alternative name for the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝
Fuxi or Fu Hsi, legendary Chinese emperor, trad. 2852-2738 BC, mythical creator of fishing, trapping and writing
Shennong or Farmer God (c. 2000 BC), first of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] and creator of agriculture in China/followers or clan of Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2]
Yuwang (c. 2000 BC), last of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4], defeated by the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4]
Di Ku or Emperor Ku, one of the Five Legendary Emperors 五帝[wu3 di4], great-grandson of the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4]
Zhuan Xu, one of the Five Legendary Emperors 五帝[wu3 di4], grandson of the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4], trad. reigned 2513-2435 BC
Shennong or Farmer God (c. 2000 BC), first of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] and creator of agriculture
Suirenshi, legendary inventor of fire
Chi You, legendary creator of metalworking and weapons/comet
God of Water

Five Legendary Emperors, usually taken to be the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4] and four of his sons Zhuan Xu 顓頊|颛顼[Zhuan1 Xu1], Di Ku 帝嚳|帝喾[Di4 Ku4], Tang Yao 唐堯|唐尧[Tang2 Yao2], Yu Shun 虞舜[Yu2 Shun4]
Dijun, Shang dynasty protector God, possibly same as legendary Emperor 帝嚳|帝喾[Di4 Ku4]
God of Fire
Yu the Great (c. 21st century BC) mythical leader who tamed the floods
tribes under the Yellow Emperor
